org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.regionserver

Class LogRollBackupSubprocedure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure.Subprocedure
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.regionserver.LogRollBackupSubprocedure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Void>

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class LogRollBackupSubprocedure
extends Subprocedure
    This backup sub-procedure implementation forces a WAL rolling on a RS.

      • acquireBarrier

        public void acquireBarrier()
        Description copied from class: Subprocedure
        The implementation of this method should gather and hold required resources (locks, disk space, etc) to satisfy the Procedures barrier condition. For example, this would be where to make all the regions on a RS on the quiescent for an procedure that required all regions to be globally quiesed. Users should override this method. If a quiescent is not required, this is overkill but can still be used to execute a procedure on all members and to propagate any exceptions. n
        Specified by:
        acquireBarrier in class Subprocedure
